name: fullstackdevelopstoday
description: - **Node.js**: JavaScript runtime for server-side development. - **Express**: Web framework for Node.js, used to set up the server and handle routes. - **Axios**: Promise-based HTTP client for making requests to the API. - **React.js**: JavaScript library for building user interfaces, particularly for single-page applications. - **Vite**: A fast build tool that provides a modern development environment. - **TailwindCSS**: Utility-first CSS framework for styling the application. - **MUI**: Material-UI for React, used for charts and UI components. ###  Api Routes

scripts.start: concurrently "npm install --prefix api" "npm install --prefix frontend" "npm run dev --prefix api" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
